entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 9.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 6:00 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: 9.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 52 %

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of rain mixed with snow. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness after midnight then periods of rain or snow mixed with drizzle. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 26 March 2023
